mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAMES(G_NUM,G_CODE, G_NAME, G_DEV, G_DATE, G_PRICE, G_CONTENT,AD_NUM) VALUES(GAMES_SEQ.nextval, #{gCode}, #{gName}, #{gDev}, #{gDate}, #{gPrice},#{gContent}, (select AD_NUM from ADMIN WHERE AUTH_NUM=(select AUTH_NUM FROM AUTH WHERE AUTH_LEVEL=3)))

INSERT INTO GAME_FILES(GF_NUM, GF_FILENAME, GF_SAVEDFILENAME, GF_LOCATION,G_NUM,GF_CODE) VALUES (GF_SEQ.nextval, #{gfFilename}, #{gfSavedfilename}, #{gfLocation},(select G_NUM from GAMES WHERE G_NAME=#{gName}),#{gfCode})
INSERT INTO GAME_GENRE(G_NUM,GEN_KEY) VALUES((select G_NUM from GAMES WHERE G_NAME=#{gName}),#{genKey})

INSERT INTO SPEC( SPEC_NUM, SPEC_MIN_CPU, SPEC_MIN_RAM, SPEC_MIN_GPU, SPEC_MIN_DX, SPEC_PRO_CPU, SPEC_PRO_RAM, SPEC_PRO_GPU, SPEC_PRO_DX, G_NUM) VALUES(SPEC_SEQ.nextval,#{specMinCpu},#{specMinRam},#{specMinGpu},#{specMinDx},#{specProCpu},#{specProRam},#{specProGpu},#{specProDx},(select G_NUM from GAMES WHERE G_NAME=#{gName}))

INSERT INTO GAME_FILES(GF_NUM, GF_FILENAME, GF_SAVEDFILENAME, GF_LOCATION,G_NUM,GF_CODE) VALUES (GF_SEQ.nextval, #{gfFilename}, #{gfSavedfilename}, #{gfLocation},(select G_NUM from GAMES WHERE G_NAME=#{gName}),#{gfCode})
